heading: Today, Groundhog Day
text: Mostly sunny. Not as cold by afternoon.
temperature: Upper teens to mid 20s north to south

heading: Monday Night
text: Clear, moonlight, then increasing clouds in NY.
temperature: Zero to 10 below, teens below in the cold spots

heading: Tuesday
text: Sun, mixing with clouds east, becoming mostly cloudy west. A little snow in NY.

heading: Wednesday
text: A few snow showers west and north, more sun south.
